name: Personnel exempt
text: §346D-8  Personnel exempt.  The department of human services may employ civil service personnel in accordance with chapter 76 to service the waiver programs. [L 1983, c 192, §10; am L 1985, c 207, pt of §1; am L 1987, c 134, pt of §1; am L 1988, c 208, pt of §3; am L 2000, c 45, §1 and c 253, §150; am L 2006, c 300, §10]
